vernac_cmds: Lemma tc_test_eq1: forall b i v m, (denote_tc_test_eq (Vptr b i) v) (m_phi m) -> Mem.weak_valid_pointer (m_dry m) b (Ptrofs.unsigned i) = true.
apply binop_lemmas4.weak_valid_pointer_dry in H0; apply H0.
destruct H; apply binop_lemmas4.weak_valid_pointer_dry in H; auto.

Lemma semax_ifthenelse: forall Delta P (b: expr) c d R, bool_type (typeof b) = true -> semax Espec Delta (fun rho => P rho && !! expr_true b rho) c R -> semax Espec Delta (fun rho => P rho && !! expr_false b rho) d R -> semax Espec Delta (fun rho => tc_expr Delta (Eunop Cop.Onotbool b (Tint I32 Signed noattr)) rho && P rho) (Sifthenelse b c d) R.
specialize (H0 psi _ _ TS HGG Prog_OK k F).
specialize (H1 psi _ _ TS HGG Prog_OK k F).
clear - H4; intros i0; destruct (H4 i0); intuition.
assert (H3then: app_pred (rguard Espec psi Delta' (frame_ret_assert R F) k) w).
intros ek vl tx vx; specialize (H3 ek vl tx vx).
assert (H3else: app_pred (rguard Espec psi Delta' (frame_ret_assert R F) k) w).
intros ek vl tx vx; specialize (H3 ek vl tx vx).
intros tx vx; specialize (H0 tx vx); specialize (H1 tx vx).
remember (construct_rho (filter_genv psi) vx tx) as rho.
pose proof (typecheck_expr_sound _ _ _ _ TC_ENV TC2) as HTCb; simpl in HTCb.
unfold liftx, lift, eval_unop in HTCb; simpl in HTCb.
destruct (bool_val (typeof b) (eval_expr b rho)) as [b'|] eqn: Hb; [|contradiction].
assert (assert_safe Espec psi vx tx (Kseq (if b' then c else d) :: k) (construct_rho (filter_genv psi) vx tx) w0) as Hw0.
unfold tc_expr in TC2; simpl in TC2.
rewrite denote_tc_assert_andp in TC2; destruct TC2.
destruct b'; [apply H0 | apply H1]; split; subst; auto; split; auto; do 3 eexists; eauto; split; auto; split; auto; apply bool_val_strict; auto; eapply typecheck_expr_sound; eauto.
intros r [Htc Hr] ora jm Hora Hge Hphi.
generalize (eval_expr_relate _ _ _ _ _ b jm HGG Hge (guard_environ_e1 _ _ _ TC)); intro.
change (level (m_phi jm)) with (level jm) in H9.
apply jsafe_step'_back2 with (st' := State vx tx (Kseq (if b' then c else d) :: k)) (m' := jm').
clear TC2'; destruct Htc as [TC2' TC2'a].
assert (exists b': bool, Cop.bool_val (eval_expr b rho) (typeof b) (m_dry jm) = Some b') as [].
clear - TS TC H TC2 TC2' TC2'a TCS.
unfold Cop.bool_val; destruct (eval_expr b rho) eqn:H15; simpl; destruct (typeof b) as [ | [| | | ] [| ]| | [ | ] | | | | | ] eqn:?; intuition; simpl in *; try rewrite TCS; eauto.

all: try ( unfold tc_expr in TC2; simpl typecheck_expr in TC2; rewrite Heqt in TC2; rewrite denote_tc_assert_andp in TC2; destruct TC2 as [_ TC2]; destruct TC as [TC _]; assert (H2 := typecheck_expr_sound _ _ _ _ (typecheck_environ_sub _ _ TS _ TC) TC2); rewrite Heqt, H15 in H2; contradiction H2).
all: rewrite denote_tc_assert_andp in TC2'; destruct TC2' as [TC2'' TC2']; rewrite binop_lemmas2.denote_tc_assert_test_eq' in TC2'; simpl in TC2'; unfold_lift in TC2'; rewrite H15 in TC2'.
all: destruct Archi.ptr64 eqn:Hp; try contradiction; eauto.
all: apply tc_test_eq1 in TC2'; simpl; rewrite TC2'; eauto.
rewrite H10; symmetry; eapply f_equal, bool_val_Cop; eauto.
replace (level jm - 1)%nat with (level jm' ) by (apply age_level in H9; omega).

Ltac inv_safe H := inv H; try solve[match goal with | H : semantics.at_external _ _ _ = _ |- _ => simpl in H; congruence | H : j_at_external _ _ _ = _ |- _ => simpl in H; congruence | H : semantics.halted _ _ _ |- _ => simpl in H; unfold cl_halted in H; contradiction end].
Lemma semax_seq: forall Delta (R: ret_assert) P Q h t, semax Espec Delta P h (overridePost Q R) -> semax Espec Delta Q t R -> semax Espec Delta P (Clight.Ssequence h t) R.
specialize (H psi _ w TS HGG Prog_OK).
intros v fsig cc A P Q; specialize (Prog_OK v fsig cc A P Q).
exists id, NEP, NEQ; split; auto.
assert ((guard Espec psi Delta' (fun rho : environ => F rho * P rho)%pred (Kseq h :: Kseq t :: k)) w).
eapply guard_safe_adj; try apply H3; try reflexivity; intros until n; apply convergent_controls_jsafe; simpl; auto; intros; destruct q'.
intro i; destruct (H3 i); [left | right]; auto.
remember (construct_rho (filter_genv psi) vx tx) as rho.
assert (app_pred (!!guard_environ Delta' (current_function k) rho && (F rho * (Q rho)) && funassert Delta' rho >=> assert_safe Espec psi vx tx (Kseq t :: k) rho) w).
clear - H1; repeat intro; apply H1.
intro i; destruct (H i); [left | right]; auto.
intros ek vl te ve; specialize (H2 ek vl te ve).
replace (exit_cont ek vl (Kseq t :: k)) with (exit_cont ek vl k) by (destruct ek; simpl; congruence).
Lemma control_as_safe_refl psi n k : control_as_safe psi n k k.
Lemma semax_loop: forall Delta Q Q' incr body R, semax Espec Delta Q body (loop1_ret_assert Q' R) -> semax Espec Delta Q' incr (loop2_ret_assert Q R) -> semax Espec Delta Q (Sloop body incr) R.
left; unfold modifiedvars in H0|-*; simpl; apply modifiedvars'_union; auto.
left; unfold modifiedvars in H0|-*; simpl; apply modifiedvars'_union; auto.
revert Prog_OK; induction w using (well_founded_induction lt_wf); intros.
change w with (level w) in H4|-*.
change w with (level w) in H4.
assert (Prog_OK2: (believe Espec Delta' psi Delta') (level a2)) by (apply pred_nec_hereditary with w; auto).
remember (construct_rho (filter_genv psi) vx tx) as rho.
eapply semax_extensionality_Delta in H; try apply TS; auto.
eapply semax_extensionality_Delta in H0; try apply TS; auto.
generalize H; rewrite semax_unfold; intros H'.
specialize (H' psi Delta' (level a2) (tycontext_sub_refl _) HGG Prog_OK2 (Kseq Scontinue :: Kloop1 body incr :: k) F CLO_body).
specialize (H0 psi _ (level a2) (tycontext_sub_refl _) HGG Prog_OK2 (Kloop2 body incr :: k) F CLO_incr).
intros ek2 vl2 tx2 vx2; unfold loop2_ret_assert.
apply (assert_safe_adj') with (k0:=Kseq (Sloop body incr) :: k); auto.
eapply convergent_controls_jsafe; try apply H11; simpl; auto.
eapply subp_trans'; [ | eapply (H1 _ LT Prog_OK2 H3' tx2 vx2)].
eapply convergent_controls_jsafe; try apply H11; simpl; auto.
eapply pred_nec_hereditary in H3; [| exact NEC2].
eapply subp_trans'; [ | eapply (H3 EK_normal vl2 tx2 vx2)].
change (exit_cont EK_return vl2 (Kloop2 body incr :: k)) with (exit_cont EK_return vl2 k).
apply (assert_safe_adj') with (k0:= Kseq incr :: Kloop2 body incr :: k); auto.
eapply subp_trans'; [ | apply (H3' EK_normal None tx3 vx3)].
destruct POST; simpl tycontext.RA_break; simpl proj_ret_assert.
eapply subp_trans'; [ | apply (H0 _ _ _ (tycontext_sub_refl _) HGG Prog_OK2 (Kloop2 body incr :: k) F CLO_incr)].
apply (assert_safe_adj') with (k0:=Kseq (Sloop body incr) :: k); auto.
eapply pred_nec_hereditary in H3; [| exact NEC2].
eapply subp_trans'; [ | eapply (H3 EK_normal vl2 tx2 vx2)].
intros ora jm Hora RE ?; subst.
generalize (age_jm_phi LEVa2'); unfold age; change R.rmap with rmap.
change R.ag_rmap with ag_rmap; rewrite LEVa2.
apply jsafeN_step with (State vx tx (Kseq body :: Kseq Scontinue :: Kloop1 body incr :: k)) jm2.
Lemma semax_break: forall Delta Q, semax Espec Delta (RA_break Q) Sbreak Q.
specialize (H0 EK_break None te ve w H1).
remember ((construct_rho (filter_genv psi) ve te)) as rho.
eapply andp_derives; try apply H0; auto.
specialize (H0 ora jm Hora H1 H2).
apply convergent_controls_jsafe with (State ve te (break_cont k)); auto.
Lemma semax_continue: forall Delta Q, semax Espec Delta (RA_continue Q) Scontinue Q.
specialize (H0 EK_continue None te ve w H1).
remember ((construct_rho (filter_genv psi) ve te)) as rho.
eapply andp_derives; try apply H0; auto.
specialize (H0 ora jm Hora H1 H2).
apply convergent_controls_jsafe with (State ve te (continue_cont k)); auto.
